javavis.jip2d.functions
Class FSegmentHSB

java.lang.Object
  javavis.jip2d.base.JIPFunction
      javavis.jip2d.functions.FSegmentHSB
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FSegmentHSB
extends JIPFunction

The input image must be a HSB image (at least 3 bands of float type). It takes the h, s and b parameters and using the corresponding error, binarizes the image.

    Input parameters:
  • img: Image to segment.
  • h: Hue value to binarize.
  • herror: Error admitted in hue band.

  • s: Saturation value to binarize.
  • serror: Error admitted in saturation band.

  • b: Brightness value to binarize.
  • berror: Error admitted in brightness band.

    Output parameters:
  • BIT binarize image.

See Also:
Serialized Form
